alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 07 at 10:44AM PST until January 09 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MONDAY TO 8 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected in rural areas. Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected in urban areas. * WHERE...Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5, Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma, Delano-Wasco-Shafter, Fresno-Clovis, Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore, Los Banos - Dos Palos, Merced - Madera - Mendota, and West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM Monday to 8 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
